fields.summary: Android: Ti.Contacts.getAllPeople() has noticeably slow performance

comments.body: I suspect the performance issue on Android >= 6 devices might have to do with what is breaking for Android < 6 devices.

Hi, 
the problem is still here on SDK 7.4.x and 7.5.x, Ti.Contacts.getAllPeople() take more than 7 seconde to read 4000 contacts
Any workaround to fix the bug

Thank's
